description: This file defines the SetCommunicationFailTimeoutRequest class, a request object used to set a communication fail timeout in a Zigbee core simulation environment. It extends a base class 'Request' and overrides the execute method to send a response.

classes.name: SetCommunicationFailTimeoutRequest
classes.description: A request class to set communication failure timeout in a Zigbee core testing environment. It extends the Request class and when executed, sends a response indicating success or failure (here always success) for the timeout setting operation.

methods.name: SetCommunicationFailTimeoutRequest
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the request with a specific request ID.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Overrides the execute method to send a response with request ID, status code 0, and a response message.
